title: Feelings and Emotions
subtitle: Volcabulary 1
words: somebody's heart is in their mouth
meanings: feeling or showing that you are sorry
feeling worried or unhappy about a situation
worried or scared that something unpleasant may happen
worried or frightened that something dangerous or unpleasant may happen
somebody feels anxious or frightened about something
slightly shocked or frightened because of something sudden that happened
unable to speak because you are surprised by something
be shocked by somebody or something
be unprepared for something difficult or dangerous
sentences: Thea was delighted to find a gift waiting for her on her desk when she stepped into class.
Gregory was thrilled that his parents were taking him to Japan during the June school holidays.
The fans were ecstatic when the band announced that they were coming to Singapore.
Myra was on cloud nine upon learning that she was representing her school at the competition.
My sister was in high spirits yesterday after clinching first place in the talent show.
With a heavy heart, the veterinarian advised Fred that his pet would not make it through the night.
The children were crestfallen when the excursion to the amusement park was cancelled.
Dejected that she had failed to make the cut for the school team, Clara cried all the way home.
One look at Glenda’s downcast expression told us that she had not done well for the audition.
To show how deeply repentant she was for accidentally deleting the document, Amelie volunteered to redo the whole project.
Feeling remorseful for his insensitive prank, my brother prepared a delicious lunch as an apology.
Annoyed by how slow the cashier was, the customer urged her to hurry.
Exasperated by my brother’s endless questions, I chased him out of my bedroom.
The participants were incensed by the judges’ pick for the winner as it was clear that they were biased.
The service staff were silently fuming at the tourists’ rude behaviour.
Felicia was so infuriated by the rowdy boys in the library that she gave them a piece of her mind.
Mum saw red when she witnessed the destruction Toby’s new pet had caused in the living room.
The strange man loitering at the void deck made Delia feel extremely uneasy.
Xavier was apprehensive about accepting the role for the school musical as he had stage fright.
Fearful of the invading soldiers, the villagers ran into the mountains to hide.
I was alarmed to find the front door ajar upon returning home from school.
Petrified of heights, Julie refused to take the roller coaster despite her sister's reassurances that it was safe.
My heart was in my mouth as I watched the firefighters struggle to put out the roaring flames.
I was startled when I suddenly heard a loud beeping sound coming from the living room.
The tourists were astounded by the sheer size of the mountain before them.
The principal's announcement that the school was closing down left the class dumbfounded.
Flabbergasted by the turn of events on stage, the host was at a loss for words.
I was taken aback when my neighbour suddenly appeared at the front door.
The people at the beach were caught off guard by the towering waves rolling towards them.
